# A ([[guardian]]) [[dog]] [[spirit]]; a [[attendant]]/[[familiar]] [[spirit]]: In Japanese mythology an inugami (lit. a "''dog spirit'',") is a type of [[shikigami]] ({{l|ja|式神}}), similar to a familiar spirit, resembling, and usually originating from, a dog, and most commonly carrying out vengeance or acting as guardians on behalf of their 'owner'.
